1. Armored Truck Heist Shuts Down Italian Highway With Shootout And Explosion  Jalopnik

item.title: Epstein Files Reveal Efforts to Build Ties With Officials in Russia - The New York Times
item.description:
1. Epstein Files Reveal Efforts to Build Ties With Officials in Russia  The New York Times
  2. Epstein built ties to Russians and sought to meet Putin, files show  The Washington Post
  3. How Close Were Epstein’s Ties to Russia, Really?  The Bulwark
  4. Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov says Epstein files reveals "pure Satanism" of Western elites  WION
  5. Poland is now investigating possible links between Jeffrey Epstein and Russian intelligence. The chairman of the Munich Security Conference, Wolfgang Ischinger, told DW that he "wouldn't be surprised" if such connections existed.  facebook.com
